metafield_definitions.name: Announcement Bar Text
metafield_definitions.description: Text displayed in the site-wide announcement bar. Supports campaign promotions, shipping info, and special offers.

graphql_mutations.create_announcement_bar: mutation CreateAnnouncementBarMetafield { metafieldDefinitionCreate(definition: { namespace: "shelzys", key: "announcement_bar", name: "Announcement Bar Text", description: "Site-wide announcement bar text", type: "single_line_text_field", ownerType: SHOP, pin: true, visibleToStorefrontApi: true, validations: [{ name: "max_length", value: "200" }] }) { createdDefinition { id } userErrors { field message } } }
graphql_mutations.set_value: mutation SetAnnouncementBar($value: String!) { metafieldsSet(metafields: [{ namespace: "shelzys", key: "announcement_bar", ownerId: "gid://shopify/Shop/SHOP_ID", type: "single_line_text_field", value: $value }]) { metafields { id } userErrors { field message } } }
